constituent: precipitous, pinnacle, parthenon, acropolis, awl, fit, meeting, umbrella, mouth, person
koohiiStory1: The rock climber trying to get up to the pinnacle is dangling from a precipitous edge, hanging only one with his icepick.
koohiiStory2: Well I have someone climbing an inflatable precipitous pinnacle. Once at the top it is so precipitous that the person is afraid to climb down and instead punctures the inflatable pinnacle with an awl to get safely and slowly back to the ground.
words: inaccessible place, impregnable position, steep place, sharp eyes
